locations.name: Athens
locations.description: The capital of Greece and the cradle of Western civilization, offering millennia of history including the Acropolis and Parthenon, alongside the charming Plaka district.

locations.name: Santorini
locations.description: A stunning volcanic island in the Aegean Sea, famous for its dramatic caldera views, iconic blue-domed churches in villages like Oia and Fira, unique volcanic beaches, and breathtaking sunsets.

locations.name: Mykonos
locations.description: A cosmopolitan island in the Cyclades group, known for its vibrant energy, picturesque whitewashed Mykonos Town (Chora), Little Venice waterfront, iconic windmills, and stylish beaches.
